id: scenario-value-scanner-young-adult-scenarios-educational-learning cooking skills progressively through recipe suggestions
title: Learning cooking skills progressively through recipe suggestions
description: Learning cooking skills progressively through recipe suggestions
content:
Scenario: Learning cooking skills progressively through recipe suggestions
    Given Aisha has minimal cooking experience
    And she wants to develop culinary capability
    When the personal_agent suggests recipes
    Then recommendations should match her current skill level
    And difficulty should increase gradually as she learns
    And it should teach techniques through practice
    And it should explain why certain methods work
    And cooking education should be progressive and achievable
    And she should build confidence and competence incrementally
